name: Lazy Devil's game life /废宅魔王的幸福生活
name_original: Lazy Devil's game life /废宅魔王的幸福生活
description:
[Game Story]
After defeating 999 famous heroes,devil lucie had conquered the world and became the strongest one.
However... She did not rule the world, but hid in the castle playing games!
Suddenly, The demon sovereign's frontier territory was raided by brave human, and the devil king decide to deal with the threat herself.
However, it seems that some people try to wastting time so that the devil can't find the brave human.
The devil have to find clues himself and find the brave human to defeat him.

[game play]
In the game, you can control the magic King moving on the map and explor.
You will talk to monster and fight for more information.
Use skills and items to damage the target during the battle and win the final victory.
A large number of treasure boxes are scattered in the game map, and the treasure can be obtained by dialogue with the treasure box.

[Combat Mode]
The devil is powerful, kill them by magic power.

[Strip Mode]
When the devil is defeated by the brave or the man of practice (PS: use prop), she will release the power of the seal in the armor, but it will lose part of the armor.
(PS: it's a real failure if you defeated by monster)

[Hidden Branch]
Part of the map has hidden events, without not any prompt.Player can explore yourself, such as hidden roads, open doors and so on.
There have some nice treasures. There are also villages and field trials where people can challenge. Defeated to get interesting props.

The author said: This is a small creative game that I did with my spare time. There is not much content and the process is not long. Please forgive me.
